SELECT p_user.*, GROUP_CONCAT( p_role.role_name SEPARATOR '|' ) AS roleName FROM platform_user p_user LEFT JOIN platform_user_role u_role ON p_user.id = u_role.user_id LEFT JOIN platform_role p_role ON p_role.id = u_role.role_id WHERE 1=1
AND p_user.username like '%' + #{queryDTO.usrname} + '%'
GROUP BY p_user.id
limit ${(queryDTO.pageNum-1)*queryDTO.pageSize},#{queryDTO.pageSize}
